info.name: Etna
info.attribution:
Layout and design by Shobu. Released to the Public Domain under CC0. Wood grain background by RyanPro available under the Pixabay license from https://pixabay.com/photos/trees-wood-yellow-wood-oak-1915247/.

The following assets are by Delapouite, available from https://game-icons.net under CC BY 3.0: https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/token.html Library image generated using the Pollinations artificial intelligence image generator, https://pollinations.ai/, using the following prompt: "scared people jumping over lava, funny, cartoon style"
info.ruleText:
Setup
The board is made of 5x5 cells symbolising lava (can't be reached by pawns). 25 stones (black tokens) are placed on it, and are used by pawns to move across the board.

Goal
A player loses when they have no possible move and is forced to pass.

Play
On their turn, a player must take 2 actions:

- move one of their pawns
Move a pawn to any adjacent stone  (orthogonal or diagonal). Pawn can't move into lava, and can only move on (pile of) stone of either same level, exactly one level higher, exactly one level lower. A stone is occupied when reached by a pawn.

- move a stone 
Pick any unoccupied stone of the lowest level (if tied, pick any stone of your choice) and stack it on any unoccupied stone. Player can't move a stone from where they have started their turn.
info.helpText:
- Players take seat
- On their turn, players move a pawn and a token by clicking and dragging them on the board

fields.text: Are you sure you want to restart the game?
